sentences.sContent: It was in this context, led with the Plantronics acoustic songs Seoul cooperation.
sentences.sContent_eng: It was in this context, led with the Plantronics acoustic songs Seoul cooperation.
sentences.sCn: 就是在这样的背景下，促成了缤特力与歌尔声学的合作。

sentences.sContent: Rock music usually has a strong back beat and often revolves around guitar either electric or acoustic.
sentences.sContent_eng: Rock music usually has a strong back beat and often revolves around guitar either electric or acoustic.
sentences.sCn: 摇滚音乐通常有一个强大的背拍，并经常围绕吉他，无论是电或声学。

sentences.sContent: Echo Sounder is a kind of acoustic measuring depth equipment, which can measure depth with the time between transmitted wave and echo on condition in which the speed of ultrasonic is fixed.
sentences.sContent_eng: Echo Sounder is a kind of acoustic measuring depth equipment, which can measure depth with the time between transmitted wave and echo on condition in which the speed of ultrasonic is fixed.
sentences.sCn: 回声测深仪是用来测量水深的一种声学测量设备，其以水中超声波的传播速度为确定条件，利用发射波与反射回波时间差来测量水深。

synos.tran: 声学的；[声]音响的；听觉的

phrases.pCn: 声发射，声频发射；声发射检验

words.tran: [声] 声学的；听觉的；音响的

trans.tranOther: relating to sound and the way people hear things
